title: Godot Engine Official
description: Godot is a 2D and 3D free and open source game engine developed by a community of contributors. It provides a huge set of common tools, so you can just focus on making your game without reinventing the wheel.

items.title: Maintenance release: Godot 3.6.2
items.description: Although we fixed many of the major 3.6 bugs in Godot 3.6.1 in June, we have decided to make a new 3.6 point release in order to keep up to date with platform requirements.
items.dc:creator: lawnjelly

items.title: Dev snapshot: Godot 4.6 dev 2
items.description: Open the floodgates!
items.dc:creator: Thaddeus Crews

items.title: Maintenance release: Godot 4.5.1
items.description: 4.5's first maintenance release arrives!
items.dc:creator: Thaddeus Crews

items.title: Godot Showcase - Material Maker
items.description: RodZilla talks about his experience developing Material Maker, a procedural PBR material creation tool made with Godot.
items.dc:creator: Hugo Locurcio

items.title: Release candidate: Godot 4.5.1 RC 2
items.description: Hotfixes so nice, we added 'em twice!
items.dc:creator: Thaddeus Crews

items.title: Release candidate: Godot 4.5.1 RC 1
items.description: Regression fixes coming in hot!
items.dc:creator: Thaddeus Crews

items.title: Looking back at GodotCon US 2025
items.description: It's time for a summary of GodotCon Boston now that all talks are available on Youtube.
items.dc:creator: Chad Stewart

items.title: Dev snapshot: Godot 4.6 dev 1
items.description: The calm before the storm…
items.dc:creator: Thaddeus Crews

items.title: Ensuring quality in the Godot documentation, a continuous process
items.description: The Godot documentation is the fruits of the labor of hundreds of people working together. How do we ensure the highest possible level of quality, while making it easy for anyone to contribute? Find out in this article.
items.dc:creator: Hugo Locurcio

items.title: Godot 4.5, making dreams accessible
items.description: From mind-blowing effects now made possible by the stencil buffer to accessibilty descriptions of your GUI elements that opens up the possibility for some with disabilities to play your game — we are proud to present to you Godot 4.5.
items.dc:creator: Godot contributors

items.title: Release candidate: Godot 4.5 RC 2
items.description: One more for the road, again!
items.dc:creator: Thaddeus Crews

items.title: Release candidate: Godot 4.5 RC 1
items.description: Godot 4.5 stable release is imminent; let the last round(s) of testing begin!
items.dc:creator: Thaddeus Crews

items.title: Godot XR update - August 2025
items.description: Upcoming XR game jam, using the XR editor, new release channels and the new Render Models API
items.dc:creator: Bastiaan Olij

items.title: Submissions open for Godot 2025 showreel
items.description: Showcase your Godot creations in 2025! We're inviting submissions of short videos featuring your published or in-progress Godot games or tools. Don't miss this chance to be a part of it!
items.dc:creator: Emi

items.title: Dev snapshot: Godot 4.5 beta 5
items.description: Back to our regularly scheduled schedule!
items.dc:creator: Thaddeus Crews

items.title: Godot Foundation welcomes JetBrains as Platinum Sponsor
items.description: The Godot Foundation is thrilled to welcome JetBrains as a Platinum Sponsor! We’re very grateful for the support, and hope you’ll give them a warm welcome too.
items.dc:creator: Godot Foundation

items.description: More critical fixes coming your way!

items.description: Julien and Simon from Blender Studio tell us about their experience working on Dogwalk.

items.title: Godot Community Poll 2025
items.description: We want to learn more about the Godot community, understand who the users of the engine are, and find out how we can better support you.
items.dc:creator: Emi
